thread.title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Matteo Darmian nearing Inter Milan switch?
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Matteo Darmian nearing Inter Milan switch?

author: James Whaling
title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Matteo Darmian nearing Inter Milan switch?
text:
Heading for Milan? Darmian is reportedly eyeing a move to Inter (Photo: PA) Share   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United defender Matteo Darmian is eyeing a switch to Inter - and has even begun to search for somewhere to live in Milan. 
That is according to The Sun, who say the Italian has grown frustrated over his failure to tie down a regular starting spot under Jose Mourinho. 
Inter are reportedly close to tying up a deal for the 27-year-old who featured as the Red Devils lost to Hull last night, but got through   at Wembley on aggregate. 
Darmian would join a select club of players to play for both San Siro sides. Carrick: Hull defeat a strange feeling Manchester United's Michael Carrick after the match (Photo: PA) 
Michael Carrick admits Manchester United's players were left with a "strange feeling" after reaching the EFL Cup final. 
  by Hull on Thursday night   end, writes the Manchester Evening News' Rob Dawson. 
"Of course, we're delighted to be there but it's a strange feeling," Carrick said. "We wanted to keep our run going and we didn't play well at all, really. 
"We expected a tough game, we expected them to come at us because they had to. We didn't play well and we're disappointed to lose the game. We don't like losing." Mourinho: Hull second leg was a draw
